feed.title: Maico Santos
feed.subtitle: A personal blog to display some of my work with coding, 3D modeling, etc.

entry.title: Thor's Mjolnir - My second design on Blender

link.title: Thor's Mjolnir - My second design on Blender

entry.summary: Hello there. In the previous post I shared the first 3D model I ever make on Blender: The Captain America’s shield. I had to keep practicing and my second design idea would also make the Marvel fanbase proud: I choose to model Thor’s Mjolnir. For this project I watched some Youtube tutorial again. So, I would like to thank CG Masters for the great content. * use your mouse to rota...

entry.title: My first 3D Model - Captain America's Shield

link.title: My first 3D Model - Captain America's Shield

entry.summary: Hello there. This is my first post so I decided to share the first thing I ever make on Blender, Cap’s shield. Surely I got I lot of help from PRX 3D Youtube chanel (in Portuguese). Enjoy :) * use your mouse to rotate the camera
